message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $120. I believe it's a great deal and worth considering.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your valuation of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $90 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $110.  Would that work for you?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I value your product at a maximum of $95. Let me know if this aligns with your expectations.
